rus.name: Papanin's quest
rus.content: Увлекательная игра "Papanin's quest" для Nokia Series 60, доступна на Playmobile.

eng.name: Papanin's quest
eng.content: The Papanin's quest game for Nokia Series 60 has been available on Playmobile.

rus.name: Mobile chase
rus.content: Увлекательнейшая гонка с элементами шутера "Mobile Chase" для Nokia Series 60, доступна на Playmobile.

eng.name: Mobile chase
eng.content: Super racing game "Mobile Chase" (contains elements of shooter) for Nokia Series 60 has been available on Playmobile.

rus.name: Air aggression
rus.content: Аркада "Air aggression" для Nokia Series 60, доступна на Playmobile.

eng.name: Air aggression
eng.content: The arcade game "Air aggression" for Nokia Series 60 has been available on Playmobile.

rus.name: Caspian monster
rus.content: Очень красочный скроллшутер "Caspian monster" для Nokia Series 60, доступен на Playmobile.

eng.name: Caspian monster
eng.content: The scrollshooter "Caspian monster" for Nokia Series 60 has been available on Playmobile.

rus.name: Kalah
rus.content: Восточная игра Калах, теперь имеет свою уникальную интерпретацию на мобильных телефонах Nokia Series 60 и доступна на Playmobile.

eng.name: Kalah
eng.content: The east game Kalah has excellent mobile verison for Nokia Series 60 what has been available on Playmobile
